H0.text: In which country did the carrot originate. Afghanistan

H1.text: In which country did the carrot originate. China

H2.text: In which country did the carrot originate. India

H3.text: In which country did the carrot originate. IROA

A4.text: The modern carrot originated in Afghanistan at about this time.

A5.text: The carrot probably originated in Iran and was originally cultivated for its leaves and seeds.
